feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love to CiTiGO. Nanluoguxiang CitiGO Huange Hotel is located 50 meters west of Nanluoguxiang subway exit E. The entrance is the main road of Di'anmen East Street. It is very convenient whether by taxi or by bus and subway. In addition, the surrounding attractions are also very many. Nearly, Nanluoguxiang, Houhai, Shichahai, and Gulou Street can be reached in ten minutes on foot, and it takes only ten minutes by car or subway to go to Prince Gongâ€™s Mansion, Wangfujing, and Jingshan Park. It is very convenient to travel and play; we will also Continue to work hard to create more and better staying experiences and look forward to your every stay.

Thank you for your trust and love to CiTiGO. One personâ€™s nine-to-five is not as good as a group of peopleâ€™s fun field. I hope that the hotel's rich and powerful shared living room will bring you more beautiful experiences and look forward to your every stay!

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
